html: These lengthy and descriptive verses suggest immorality in temple prostitution, which involved even the kings. The message was condensed by the angel who announced the fall of Babylon; he declared that "all nations" and the kings of the earth had committed fornication with Babylon (see Rev. 18:3). In other words, the nations honor the Lord with their mouths, but their hearts are far from him, and they turn to the worship of a king or government for security.
